definitions.title: Hithpalp.
definitions.body: linger, tarry (cf. Ar. mahah;un slow walk, delay (Ḳam.));—

definitions.title: Hithpalp.
definitions.body: Pf. 1 S. [[הִתְמַהְמָָהְתִּי]] Ps 119:60; 3 pl. [[הִתְמַהְמְהוּ]] Ju Jdg 19:8; 1 pl. [[הִתְמַהְמָָהְנוּ]] Ge 43:10; Impf. [[יִתְמַהְמַהּ]] Hb Hab 2:3; ´[[וַיִּתְמ]] Ge 19:16; Imv. mpl. [[הִתְמַהְמְהוּ]] Is 29:9; Inf. [[לְהִתְמַחְמֵהַּ]] Ex 12:39; Pt. [[מִתְמַהְמֵהַּ]] 2Sa 15:28 ;—linger, tarry, wait, of pers., Ge 19:16 Ge 43:10 (J), Ex 12:39 (E), Ju Jdg 3:26, Jdg 19:8, 2Sa 15:28, Is 29:9, Ps 119:60 (c. [[לֽא]], opp. [[חַ֫שְׁתִּי]]); subj. [[חָזוֹן]] vision Hb Hab 2:3
